parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of direction vector as defined in swSelectType_e : swSelDATAMAXES (axis) swSelDATUMPLANES (plane) swSelEDGES (edge) swSelFACES (face)

title: ISweepFeatureData.GetPathAlignmentDirectionVector
description: Gets the direction vector of the specified type for this sweep feature.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of direction vector as defined in swSelectType_e : swSelDATAMAXES (axis) swSelDATUMPLANES (plane) swSelEDGES (edge) swSelFACES (face)

returns: Plane , planar face , line , edge , cylinder , axis , or a pair of vertices that defines the direction
remarks:
This method is valid only if:
ISweepFeatureData:TwistControlType
is set to
swTwistControlType_e
.swTwistControlFollowPath.
- and -
ISweepFeatureData::PathAlignmentType
is set to
swTangencyType_e
.swTangencyDirectionVector.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
